title: New: Séyi – Icecold
body:
_‘Draw your gun and fire between_  
_Our future plans and the gasoline,_  
_the reddest eyes than turn to green_  
_whilst bruising blue in the sea’_

Elusive new outfit Séyi dazzle on their debut track Icecold, with the help of a ‘flatmate’ on backing vocals.

Purposefully mysterious? You bet. Bloody brilliant? Of course.

Purposefully mysterious? You bet. Bloody brilliant? Of course.
